column1: Little Goat Diner////What I ordered: I started off with a cappuccino-- amazing. Def one of the best I've had in the city. It was perfectly frothy with no bitter
column2: sour taste. For an appetizer I tried the tempura potatoes. They were good. There was a lot of Asian flavor. For my main I got the Bi Bim Bop Breakfast Bowl. It sounded good
column3: but there was something off to me. Idk if the pickled veggies didn't sit right in my stomach or the sauce was spoiled sour-tasting. I truthfully am already having stomach problems after eating here.
